title: The Brief – Iran’s diplomatic ‘Wind of Change’
summary_full: It's unlikely Iran's diplomats would be jumping ship if they believed the regime was sustainable. Now is the time to isolate Tehran even further, cutting all diplomatic ties and signalling to other would-be turncoats that it's now or never
summary_public: It's unlikely Iran's diplomats would be jumping ship if they believed the regime was sustainable. Now is the time to isolate Tehran even further, cutting all diplomatic ties and signalling to other would-be turncoats tha…

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Now is the time to isolate Tehran even further, cutting all diplomatic ties
